name: A-pot-cathary
description:
Instructions:

Combine two ingredients to cure the ills of the local population! Ingredients can be grown in the plant room and stored and combined in the alchemy room.

Click on pots in the plant room to sow seeds and harvest plants.

Press A/D to swap rooms and SPACE to move to the next day so your plants grow.

Select quests in the top left, and the plants you want to brew on the right, experiment to discover the cures for various afflictions!

Good luck…
